Apollo Global Management APO, -2.43% KKR KKR, -2.82% , The Blackstone Group BX, -2.12% Sinclair Broadcast Group SBGI, -0.62% and Tegna TEGNA have also made first-round bids for the 22 networks, CNBC reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.
Amazon.com Inc. AMZN, -4.12% is bidding on all 22 regional sports networks that the Walt Disney Co. DIS, -1.30% acquired from 21st Century Fox FOXA, -0.48% , CNBC reported Tuesday.
The Department of Justice announced in June that Disney would have to divest the regional sports networks as a condition of its acquisition of large parts of Fox.
CNBC added that the second round of bids is expected by the year's end, and due diligence on the bid begins next week.
Shares of Amazon have gained 30% in the year to date, while the tech-heavy Nasdaq has gained 0.9%.
